name: Steadfast Sentry
originalText:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Steadfast Sentry dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

rulings.text: If another creature is dealt lethal damage at the same time as Steadfast Sentry, Steadfast Sentry’s triggered ability can’t put a +1/+1 counter on the other creature in time to save it.
